translation.Name: <color=#b8b188>Concord: </color><color=legendary>Establishing a Connection</color>
translation.Description: With the radio parts fixed and ready to be used, they need a suitable place. The Radio tower in the south west is suitable, but according to Amira, a man wearing an trenchcoat seems to have run away with the components needed for it to the west. You'll need to get the components from this man first.
